I would soar over the mountains and enjoy the breathtaking view from above.
I would take a trip to the nearest city and explore it from a bird's eye perspective.
I would visit different countries and cultures from a bird's eye view, experiencing new sights and sounds.
I would help rescue animals from dangerous situations by flying to their location and rescuing them.
I would explore the depths of the ocean by flying underwater and experiencing the beauty of the underwater world.
